title: Wavelength-resolved quantum yields for Vanillin Photochemistry: Self-Reaction and Ionic-Strength Implications for Wildfire Brown Carbon Lifetime

The light absorbing content of organic aerosol, brown carbon (BrC), directly affects climate and can play a role in the oxidative aging of organic aerosol. Recent estimates suggest that globally...
